main-section.title: Hello, I'm
main-section.name: Ronald
main-section.description: An enthusiastic web and mobile developer. I currently work as a frontend developer at the Secretariat of Innovation, using technologies such as Vue 3, React, and TailwindCSS. Additionally, I continue developing PocketTool in my free time.

training-section.academic-description: Graduated from the Computer Systems Engineering program at the University of El Salvador.
training-section.self-taught-description: Through self-learning, I have acquired knowledge in web application development using React, React Native, and Vue 3. Additionally, I have explored tools like TailwindCSS, among others. I have also developed skills in version control tools such as Git and GitHub.
training-section.english-description: Basic knowledge of the English language, primarily in reading comprehension. I am currently in the process of learning it.

working-section.title: What I'm doing?
working-section.description: I currently work as a frontend developer at the Secretariat of Innovation, where I participate in the development of web applications using Vue 3, React, and TailwindCSS. Additionally, in my free time, I continue improving PocketTool, incorporating new features and optimizing its performance.

eco.title: Eco
eco.description: Eco is a mobile application developed with React Native and Expo. This application enables users to track their expenses and income, set savings goals, and maintain a daily record of their activities.

family-business.title: Family Business
family-business.description: This is a web application developed with Next.js and TailwindCSS. It is intended to be used by a family business to manage its products, and sales. The information is stored in a PostgreSQL database and the application is hosted on Vercel.

sh.title: SH
sh.description: It is a web system developed with Supabase and Next.js, it arises as a final project of the 'Computer Project Management' subject, it mainly has pharmacy control, appointments and medical consultations..

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: It is a website developed with Vite and Firebase, it is a project developed with a multidisciplinary team in which I am part of the development team.

pockettool.title: PocketTool
pockettool.description: Mobile application for personal finance management, allowing users to track income, expenses, and savings goals.

conadem.title: Conadem
conadem.description: Participation in the development of the landing page and administrative platform for the National Council for Evaluation and Accreditation.

innovatech.title: Innovatech
innovatech.description: Participation in the development of the landing page for the government’s Innovation and Technology portal.
